data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Araujo, Rodrigo De Oliveira, Vivallo, Felipe, Araujo, Cristina De Oliveira (2013): Five new species of Baeus Haliday, 1833 (Hymenoptera: Platygastroidea: Scelioninae) from Brazil with an updated key to Neotropical species. Zootaxa 3670 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.1.7
